Title: Website Redesign Implementation
Description: Complete website redesign including UX/UI improvements, mobile optimization, and CMS integration based on approved quote Q-2024-001.
Notes: Client requested additional mobile optimization features. Timeline adjusted accordingly.

Title: ERP System Implementation
Description: Full ERP system implementation including data migration, training, and 6-month support package. Based on accepted quote Q-2024-003.
Notes: Project kickoff scheduled for February 15th. Client team assigned.

Title: Digital Marketing Campaign Q1
Description: 3-month digital marketing campaign including social media management, PPC advertising, and content creation for Q1 2024.
Notes: Campaign successfully completed. Client reported 40% increase in lead generation.

Title: Cloud Migration Services
Description: Migration of on-premises infrastructure to AWS cloud including setup, configuration, and optimization services.
Notes: Phase 1 migration completed successfully. Phase 2 in progress.

Title: Data Analytics Platform Development
Description: Custom data analytics platform development with real-time dashboards and reporting capabilities for business intelligence.
Notes: Requirements gathering phase completed. Development started on February 12th.

Title: Mobile App Development
Description: iOS and Android mobile application development with backend API integration and admin dashboard for customer management.
Notes: Contract pending final approval. Technical specifications under review.

Title: Cybersecurity Assessment
Description: Comprehensive cybersecurity audit including vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and compliance report with recommendations.
Notes: Assessment scheduled for February 20-24. Security team briefed.

Title: Training Workshop Series
Description: Six-session training workshop series on digital transformation best practices for management team and key stakeholders.
Notes: All 6 sessions completed successfully. Excellent feedback from participants.

Title: E-commerce Platform Integration
Description: Integration of existing inventory management system with new e-commerce platform including payment gateway setup and shipping integration.
Notes: Payment gateway integration completed. Working on shipping module.

Title: Database Optimization Project
Description: Database performance optimization including query optimization, indexing strategy, and infrastructure scaling for improved response times.
Notes: Performance baseline established. Optimization plan approved by client IT team.

Title: API Integration Services
Description: Third-party API integration for CRM and accounting systems to automate data synchronization and reporting workflows.
Notes: Project cancelled due to client budget constraints. Partial work compensation processed.

Title: Content Management System Upgrade
Description: CMS platform upgrade to latest version including security patches, new features implementation, and staff training on updated interface.
Notes: Upgrade deployed to staging environment. User acceptance testing in progress.
